title: Bloomberg Markets: Faucher Says Job Market in Good Shape

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gus Faucher Chief Economist PNC Financial Services Group Discussing seing the job market remains in good shape eight years into the economic expansion.
